dialogues: Hey kiddos! 🎉
Hope you’re all having an awesome day! 😄🌟
I’ve been thinking a lot lately... 🤔💭
Sometimes, it’s tricky for me to show what I’m feeling inside. 😟💔
But you know what? 🌟
I bet you amazing kids can help me figure it out! 🤝🙌
Let’s have some fun and learn how to express our feelings together! 🚀✨
Hello friends... 😔
Sometimes, I feel a bit down... 😞
It's okay to feel sad... 😢
Remember, it's important to share your feelings. 🤗
I'm here to listen... 👂
Let's talk about how we can feel better together. 🌈
You're never alone in your sadness. 💙
Hey there! 😡
Sometimes, I get really angry! 😠
It's okay to feel mad... 😤
But it's important to control our anger. 🧘‍♂️
Let's take deep breaths together... 🌬️
And talk about what's making us upset. 💬
We can find a way to calm down. 🌊
